EmailTemplate.description: Airline Becomes Active for the First Time Notification Email
EmailTemplate.name: Airline Becomes Active for the First Time Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Account.Name} HAS BECOME ACTIVE FOR THE FIRST TIME
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Account.Name}, based in {!Account.IATA_ISO_Country__c}, has become Active.
Last modified by: {!Account.LastModifiedBy}, {!Account.LastModifiedDate}
